name: Release

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
      - test
      - develop

jobs:
  release:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: write
    steps:
      - name: Checkout Code
        uses: actions/checkout@v2
        with:
          persist-credentials: false

      - name: Install Dependencies
        run: npm install 

      - name: Semantic Release
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.RELEASE_BOT_TOKEN }}
        run: npx semantic-release

  helloworld:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - run: echo "Hello, world!"
